scripts.bundle: npm test && npm run dist && npm run docco && npm run api && ls -hall dist/
scripts.modules-update: for d in ./modules/*/ ; do (echo "$d" && cd "$d" && rm -rf node_modules/tonal-* && npm i); done
scripts.modules-build: for d in ./modules/*/ ; do (echo "$d" && cd "$d" && rollup -c); done
scripts.modules-api: for d in ./modules/*/ ; do (echo "$d" && cd "$d" && jsdoc2md index.js > API.md); done
scripts.modules-test: for d in ./modules/*/ ; do (echo "$d" && cd "$d" && npm test); done
scripts.test-ci: npm run packages-build && npm run packages-test
